Class ItemService

java.lang.Object
com.bbbb.data.Item.ItemService
public class ItemService extends Object
Service class for handling Item related database operations.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ItemService(Database database)
    Constructs an ItemService with a database connection.

  • Constructor Details

    • ItemService

      public ItemService(Database database)
      Constructs an ItemService with a database connection.
      Parameters:
      database - The database connection to be used by this service.

  • Method Details

    • getItems

      public List<Item> getItems(ItemCategory category)
      Retrieves a list of items from the database, optionally filtered by category.
      Parameters:
      category - The ItemCategory to filter items by, or null to retrieve all items.
      Returns:
      A list of Item objects corresponding to the query result. If an error occurs, an empty list is returned.

    • updateItemPrice

      public void updateItemPrice(Item item, BigDecimal newPrice)
      Updates the price of an item in the database.
      Parameters:
      item - The Item whose price needs to be updated.
      newPrice - The new price of the item as a BigDecimal.

    • updateActiveItem

      public void updateActiveItem(Item item)
      Updates the active status of an item in the database.
      Parameters:
      item - The Item whose active status needs to be updated.

    • updateItemIngredientQuantity

      public void updateItemIngredientQuantity(Item item, Ingredient ingredient, BigDecimal updatedQuantity)
      Updates or inserts the quantity of an ingredient associated with an item in the database.
      Parameters:
      item - The Item to which the ingredient belongs.
      ingredient - The Ingredient whose quantity needs to be updated.
      updatedQuantity - The new quantity of the ingredient as a BigDecimal.

    • createNewItem

      public void createNewItem(String name, String category, BigDecimal price)
      Creates a new item in the database.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the new item.
      category - The category of the item as a string.
      price - The price of the item as a BigDecimal.

    • deleteItem

      public void deleteItem(Item item)
      Deletes an item from the database
      Parameters:
      item - The Item to be deleted from the database.
